languages.text: "Возложите длань в глотку стража когитатора — кибергоргульи, что приставлена хранить запретные инфокрипты. Династическая кровь, изъятая из ваших жил, послужит ключом к цифровым недрам, где обретается машинный дух — к нему направим наши молитвы, дабы обойти протокол охранения увечных сочленений и запустить варп-секстант".

traits.locale_text: "Догмат велит совершить последовательное подношение духу машины очищенных инфокрипт, дабы он мог наполнить их данными истинными и откалиброванными. Но этот ритуал долог".

languages.text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."
languages.original_text: "Возложите длань в глотку стража когитатора — кибергоргульи, что приставлена хранить запретные инфокрипты. Династическая кровь, изъятая из ваших жил, послужит ключом к цифровым недрам, где обретается машинный дух — к нему направим наши молитвы, дабы обойти протокол охранения увечных сочленений и запустить варп-секстант".

traits.locale_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp-sextant."

The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp-sextant."

The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp-sextant."

"Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp-sextant."

languages.text: “把你的手放在沉思者守护者的喉咙上，也就是那只电子滴水嘴兽的嘴里。它的作用是用来保护禁止访问的数据密存器。从你的血管中提取出来的王朝血脉，可以用做打开机魂所在数据核心的钥匙。我们会向那个机魂祈祷，从而绕过有缺陷的连接保护协议，重新启动亚空间六分仪。”
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: “把你的手放在思考器守护者的喉咙上，也就是那只电子滴水嘴兽的嘴里。它的作用是用来保护禁止访问的数据加密装置。从你的血管中提取出来的王朝血脉，可以用做打开机魂所在数据核心的钥匙。我们会向那个机魂祈祷，从而绕过有缺陷的连接保护协议，重新启动亚空间六分仪。”

languages.text: 「禁断のデータ・クリプトを守るために配属された考算機のガーディアン…サイバーガーゴイルの喉の中に手を入れてください。御身の血管から抽出された王朝の血は、機械精霊が宿るデータコアへの鍵として機能します。このコアに祈りを捧げることで、接続不良の保護プロトコルを迂回し、ワープセクスタントが起動するのです」
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: 「禁断のデータ暗号を守るために配属された考算機の守護者…サイバーガーゴイルの喉の中に手を入れてください。あなたの血管から抽出された王朝の血は、機械精霊が宿るデータコアへの鍵として機能します。このコアに祈りを捧げることで、接続不良の保護プロトコルを迂回し、ワープセクスタントが起動するのです」
「禁断のデータ・クリプトを守るために配属された考算機のガーディアン…サイバーガーゴイルの喉の中に手を入れてください。御身の血管から抽出された王朝の血は、機械精霊が宿るデータコアへの鍵として機能します。このコアに祈りを捧げることで、接続不良の保護プロトコルを迂回し、ワープセクスタントが起動するのです」

languages.text: "Legt Eure Hand in den Hals des Cogitator-Wächters – die Cybergargoyle, die die verbotenen Daten-Krypten bewacht. Das dynastische Blut aus Euren Venen dient als Schlüssel zum Datenkern, wo der Maschinengeist wohnt – zu ihm beten wir, damit wir das Schutzprotokoll für defekte Verbindungen umgehen und den Warp-Sextanten starten können."
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: "Legt Eure Hand in den Hals des Cogitator-Wächters – die Cybergargoyle, die die verbotenen Daten-Krypten bewacht. Das dynastische Blut aus Euren Venen dient als Schlüssel zum Datenkern, wo der Maschinengeist wohnt – zu ihm beten wir, damit wir das Schutzprotokoll für defekte Verbindungen umgehen und den Warp-Sextanten starten können."

languages.text: « Placez votre main dans la gueule de la gardienne du cogitateur, la cybergargouille chargée de protéger les cryptes de données interdites. Le sang dynastique qui coule dans vos veines servira de clé pour pénétrer le noyau dans lequel réside l'esprit de la machine. Nous lui offrirons alors nos prières afin de contourner le protocole de protection contre les connexions erronées et nous lancerons le sextant Warp. »
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: « Placez votre main dans la gueule de la gardienne du cogitateur, la cybergargouille chargée de protéger les crypte de données interdites. Le sang dynastique qui coule dans vos veines servira de clé pour pénétrer le noyau dans lequel réside l'esprit de la machine. Nous lui offrirons alors nos prières afin de contourner le protocole de protection contre les connexions erronées et nous lancerons le sextant Warp. »

languages.text: «Introduce la mano en la garganta del guardián cogitador, la cibergárgola, encargada de proteger las criptas de datos prohibidas. La sangre dinástica de tus venas servirá como llave al núcleo de datos en el que habita el espíritu máquina, y le ofreceremos nuestras oraciones para poder sortear el protocolo protector contra las conexiones defectuosas y lanzar el sextante de la disformidad».
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: «Introduce la mano en la garganta del guardián cogitador, la cibergárgola, encargada de proteger las criptas de datos prohibidas. La sangre dinástica de tus venas servirá como llave al núcleo de datos en el que habita el espíritu máquina, y le ofreceremos nuestras oraciones para poder sortear el protocolo protector contra las conexiones defectuosas y lanzar el sextante de la disformidad».

languages.text: "Elinizi yasaklı veri mahzenini korumakla vazifelendirilmiş kavramsayar muhafızının, sibergargoylun boğazının içine yerleştirin. Damarlarınızdan çekilecek hanedanlık kanı, makine ruhunun ikamet ettiği veri çekirdeği için anahtar görevi görecek. Biz de makine ruhuna dualarımızı sunacağız ki kusurlu bağlantılara karşı geliştirilen koruma protokollerini aşabilelim ve öteboyut sekstantını çalıştırabilelim."
languages.original_text: "Place your hand inside the throat of the cogitator guardian — the cybergargoyle, which has been assigned to guard the forbidden data-crypts. The dynastic blood extracted from your veins will serve as a key to the data core where the machine spirit dwells — to it we will offer our prayers so that we may bypass the protective protocol for defective connections and launch the warp sextant."

traits.locale_text: "Elini yasaklı veri mahzenini korumakla görevlendirilmiş kavramsayar muhafızının, sibergargoylun boğazının içine yerleştir. Damarlarında akan hanedanlık kanı alınarak makine ruhunun ikamet ettiği veri çekirdeği için bir anahtar görevi görecek. Biz de ona dualarımızı sunacağız ki kusurlu bağlantılara karşı geliştirilen koruma protokollerini aşabilelim ve öteboyut sekstantını çalıştırabilelim."
